author: psmith
msg: Added the chainsaw-build.xml and associated build.chainsaw.properties.sample file, plus a HOWTO document on how to get it all running.

author: psmith
msg: These 'original' Chainsaw files are also needed to compile correctly.

author: sdeboy
msg: Initial add of new version of Chainsaw (main class is org.apache.log4j.chainsaw.LogUI).
See org/apache/log4j/xml/examples directory for example source (sender) and sink (chainsaw) xml configuration files.

To run this UI, first get the tip of the jakarta-log4j package and build it (dependencies on ChainsawViewer, Category, etc).  Then, build this set of classes and ensure the sandbox build directory is before the jakarta-log4j build directory in the classpath.
Note: as events are received, a new panel will appear in the tab pane.  All actions for that panel are available from the right click menu.

author: hoju
msg: Added new configuration parameter to InitContextListener and InitServlet called "log4j-sysprop-name" so one can override the more tomcat specific dynamic generation of the system property name.  This makes it compatible with any and all containers (although I've still only tested under Tomcat).  Added a semicolon to a place in ContextJNDISelector to get rid of checkstyle warning.
Also updated buld.properties.sample to reference latest jars such as checkstyle 3.0 and log4j-1.2.8.
